name: Wolfpack Hunter Adventure
description:
Welcome to Wolfpack Hunter Adventure! 

The platformer game with interesting things.  Have fun with this game and share it with friends as well. 

This platform type game includes: Over 50 amazing levels! 4 lands to discover! Interesting platforms! Cool enemies and bosses! and MORE! 

STORY:  In the World of Wolfpack, there was once a brown sackboy named Cosine, He loved to explore everything in Friendly Hills, now he has a quest he needs to complete before its too late! He needs to find his four friends from different castles, His friends are Maxwell the Tiger, Tifftoad the Frog, Rocket the Birdie, and Jack the Panther! Cosine also must go all the way to the Evil Inferno to save his gold wolf and take down the evil Coslash! It's up to Cosine to complete this quest and save all of the World of Wolfpack!
